title: Production Department & Bas Jan Ader typefaces
content:
Hello- Wondering if anyone can tell me the name of these typefaces, both works from the super talented superfamous.

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907003624im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/hereisalways-01_4557.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907003624im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/tpdnew-01_3906.jpg)

 [‹ Typewriter face query](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907003624/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44203 "Go to previous forum topic") [20's looking font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907003624/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44205 "Go to next forum topic")
author: J_P_C

comments.content:
Your top sample is some version of DIN and PT Hermes for the large text.

[http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/paratype/hermes\_bold\_ot/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907003624/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/paratype/hermes_bold_ot/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/paratype/hermes\_bold\_ot/")
